segments.text: I see the boy standing on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined to get those cookies, no matter the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, but he doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember being that determined to get a treat when I was a kid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, looking so hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit happy seeing their teamwork, even if it's for something sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just right there, and they think they can get away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, but I also hope they don't hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so full of childhood mischief and adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their determination and teamwork.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like watching a little heist movie, with cookies as the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR
